# moveToActiveSpace

**Type Property**

When the window becomes active, move it to the active space instead of switching spaces.

## Declaration

```swift
static var moveToActiveSpace: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Spaces

- **canJoinAllSpaces**: The window can appear in all spaces.
